text: [Music]
today I'm gonna give you a few tips on
how to get the most out of your basic
stool cupboard ingredients or as Jamie
would say pimping up your condiments
these tips are really simple and will
add some extra flavor to any dish
first up chilling oil add six
tablespoons of olive oil to the saucepan
then finally sized one garlic clove and
two red chillies add to the pan and warm
through for five minutes
ensuring your garlic doesn't Brown add
to a bowl leave to cool slightly on your
chili oil is ready to serve
next up lemon salt great and says three
lemons into a baking tray add 300 grams
of flaky sea salt and a juice of warm
lemon mix everything together and then
pop in the oven to Kin into a sterilized
jar next is a delicious chili pepper mix
add one quarter of a sheet of nori a
dried orange peel four teaspoons of
black pepper two teaspoons of black
sesame seeds two teaspoons of white
sesame seeds two teaspoons of chili
flakes and one teaspoon of ground ginger
give everything a good mix together and
store in sterilized jars and now for a
super simple olive oil dressing add six
tablespoons of extra virgin olive oil to
the sterilized jar and then pour in
three tablespoons of lemon juice add in
a tablespoon of honey add pepper and a
pinch of sea salt give it a good shake
and it's ready to serve and finally
chili vinegar sliced 2 fresh Long
chilies lengthways add to an empty
bottle add in two fresh bay leaves
then pour 250 mils of red wine vinegar
into the bottle and your chili vinegar
is ready to serve I hope you give these
a go and let us know if you have any
tips of your own leave me a comment in
the box below bye guys
[Music]
